ui.tools
Class DrawingTool

java.lang.Object
  ui.tools.DrawingTool
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreationTool, ModifyEdgeTool, MovementTool, SelectionTool, TextTool
public abstract class DrawingTool
extends java.lang.Object

All tools used by the drawing board to handle requests forwarded from keyboard and mouse events extend this class. These tools may also update the command history and shared data model.

Author:
helen bretzke
